column4: I have a problem with Beryl and Ubuntu Desktop Effects, whenever I try to enable them, my screen just goes white and I can't see anything. Then I have to guess at where the box is to turn it off and do it without seeing anything. Anyone know what my problem it is?
what type of card do you have?
I have an ATI Radeon Xpress 200M graphics card, and my configuration is the default for Ubuntu 7.04
you can use synaptic to get the fglrx drivers
